Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Cicero
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner and Chicago due to street blockage near Chicago/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner and Chicago due to street blockage near Chicago/Cicero.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Southbound Reroute near Cicero/24th Place
ShortDescription: EB 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Cermak, Kostner, Ogden and Cicero: due to, street blockage near Cicero/24th Place.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Cermak, Kostner, Ogden and Cicero, due to street blockage near Cicero/24th Place.

Westbound buses are not affected.
